page.title: 02ATTITUDES
page.content: Attitudes to life in Birtley vary depending on whether you have a job or not and since the Caterpillar Tractor Company closed many are unemployed. Many people, particularly young unemployed, get drunk, vandalize Birtley and just hang around the streets looking for trouble. Some pupils have the wrong attitude and hate school there is a lot of truancy but most people get caught. Fifth year pupils may get a job or Youth Training Scheme. The YTS pay is only '25 a week many think it is slave labour and a waste of time. Most people in Birtley are sick of the present government but know that the next lot will not be much better. The attitude of most people is "life is hard but make the best of it."
